StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerWaiverData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@WaiverID as integer AS
SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(11), W.WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE, 106) AS WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE, W.WAIVER_OCCASION_ID, T.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID, T.WAIVER_TYPE_ID, COALESCE(W.WAIVER_DETAILS, SPACE(0)) AS WAIVER_DETAILS, W.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), W.APPROVAL_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS APPROVAL_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), W.APPROVAL_NUMBER), SPACE(0)) AS APPROVAL_NUMBER, T.WAIVER_CODE, T.WAIVER_LEVEL, T.EXCEPTION_TO_POLICY, T.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC, T.WAIVER_TYPE_CONDITIONS, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), W.DISAPPROVAL_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS DISAPPROVAL_DATE FROM OFFICER_WAIVER W INNER JOIN OFFICER_WAIVER_TYPE T ON (W.OFFICER_WAIVER_ID = @WaiverID AND W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = T.WAIVER_TYPE_ID)
